r60v.name: Rocket R60V
r60v.description: Dual boiler and PID controlled. Rotary pump with water reservoir or direct water connection.

r58.name: Rocket R58
r58.description: Dual independently operated PID controlled boilers allowing for optimum extraction of any coffee type or roast style.

mazzafiato.name: Rocket Mazzafiato
mazzafiato.description: Temperature control is optimised through a PID controller drawing on 4 different signal parameters to ensure stability and optimum results in the cup.

r9.name: Rocket R 9
r9.description: Pressure transducer technology was used to dramatically reduce steam pressure recovery times, increasingly important in high volume cafes.

boxer_2.name: Rocket Boxer Alto 2
boxer_2.description: A premium compact machine combining the specifications necessary to produce espresso without compromise yet retaining both the style and finish not normally found in the compact machine market.

boxer_1.name: Rocket Boxer Single Group
boxer_1.description: A smaller sized machine for those businesses where space is a premium, drawing on over sized boiler capacities that will cope with any peak service demand.

forte.name: Baratza Forté AP
forte.description: The Forté AP is a compact, commercial grade grinder, dedicated to grinding for ALL brew methods.

sette.name: Baratza Sette 270W
sette.description: Designed using the weighing technology of Acaia, giving precise and accurate weight based dosing with the revolutionary ability to grind by weight directly into a portafilter.

vario_w.name: Baratza Vario-W
vario_w.description: A weight-based grinder for extreme accuracy making it easier to brew that perfect cup of coffee.
